name: Send Email Tool
semantic_context: Sends an email using SMTP protocol
natural_language_description: 这是 Send Email Tool 节点。主要用于: Sends an email using SMTP protocol

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Sends an email using SMTP protocol
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Sends an email using SMTP protocol | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: email
available_options: Email (值: email)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send
available_options: Send (值: send)
Send and Wait for Response (值: sendAndWait)

fromEmail.name: fromEmail
fromEmail.description: Email address of the sender. You can also specify a name: Nathan Doe <nate@n8n.io>.
fromEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: From Email | 作用: Email address of the sender. You can also specify a name: Nathan Doe <nate@n8n.io>. | (必填项)

toEmail.name: toEmail
toEmail.description: Email address of the recipient. You can also specify a name: Nathan Doe <nate@n8n.io>.
toEmail.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Email | 作用: Email address of the recipient. You can also specify a name: Nathan Doe <nate@n8n.io>. | (必填项)

emailFormat.name: emailFormat
emailFormat.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email Format | 默认值: text
available_options: Text (值: text)
HTML (值: html)
Both (值: both)

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Plain text message of email

html.name: html
html.natural_language_description: 参数名: HTML | 作用: HTML text message of email

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: messageButtonLabel (值: None)
responseFormTitle (值: None) - Title of the form that the user can access to provide their response
responseFormDescription (值: None) - Description of the form that the user can access to provide their response
responseFormButtonLabel (值: None)
responseFormCustomCss (值: None) - Override default styling of the response form with CSS
limitWaitTime (值: None) - Whether the workflow will automatically resume execution after the specified limit type
appendAttribution (值: None) - Whether to include the phrase "This message was sent automatically with n8n" to the end of the message

responseType.name: responseType
responseType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Response Type | 默认值: approval
available_options: Approval (值: approval) - User can approve/disapprove from within the message
Free Text (值: freeText) - User can submit a response via a form
Custom Form (值: customForm) - User can submit a response via a custom form

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields
available_options: Using Fields Below (值: fields)
Using JSON (值: json)

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)

approvalOptions.name: approvalOptions
approvalOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Approval Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: values (值: None)
